I got in touch with Dr. Ritu for my toothache problem just days before the city went into lockdown but could not get my treatment done at that time. However, she was kind enough to stay in touch and helped me manage my pain throughout the lockdown period. She would often drop messages to check on my well being, give detailed feedback on pictures of the problem I would share and if need be, would even consult over a video call and all this without ever charging me a penny. Had it not been for Dr. Ritu, I would not have survived the 4 months of lockdown!

I finally got a chance to visit her clinic after she resumed work in August. I was mighty impressed with the amount of safety procedures she has implemented in her clinic to ensure the well being of her patients in these difficult times. Over the months, she had come to know how much I dreaded visiting a dentist and spent a lot of time explaining me the whole treatment procedure. She made sure to stop every time I felt slightest of discomfort and ensured that I did not feel any pain throughout the procedure, making the whole experience rather joyful. Although this was first of the many visits that I would need to make for additional procedures that I require to get back to 100%, I am no longer scared of visiting a dentist and am already looking forward to my next sitting.

As long as my work allows me to continue to stay here in Mumbai, Dr. Ritu will always be my preferred choice of dentist :)
